abstract: The app intent conforms to the Assistant schema for loading a URL in a browser tab.
overview:
## Overview

Use Swift macros that generate additional properties and add protocol conformance for your app intent implementation. The following example shows an app intent that conforms to the `.browser.openURLInTab` schema:

For more information about the `.browser` app intent domain, see [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/Making-browser-actions-available-to-siri-and-apple-intelligence]. For general information about app intent domains, see [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/Integrating-actions-with-siri-and-apple-intelligence].
title: openURLInTab
